title: How long do I have to wait to re try my prepaid cards
body: I think I must of been making a mistake so I kept tying to put the codes in and now I have to wait, what do I do ?

replies.body:
That's not a lot of information.

What exactly is happening? (Are you redeeming a physical card or just the code?)

What card is it? (Prepaid and what amount, purchased from an unofficial source, credit, etc.)

What error are you encountering? (Card invalid, non-existant, etc.) Screens would be nice.
